long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
::::IMPORTANT:::: 
To use this extension you must first have an account with Internet Countermeasure Systemsâ„¢. An innovative application used on behalf of leading brands and organisations worldwide for brand protection and online monitoring - For more information and a 30 day trial visit www.icmsworldwide.com.

::::INSTRUCTIONS::::
For users with an ICMS account- This extension allows you to add any web page or URL you find online, directly into your ICMS account. Once you have installed this extension, navigate to any web page and click on the ICMS icon, which will be located next to your chrome address bar. If you're not already logged into ICMS, you will be prompted to do so. If you are logged in, simply select an operation, select a panel and click the add button. When you check the relevant operation and panel in your ICMS account, you will see the before-added URL.
